description: They’re your digital id in the blockchain world. The keys prove that you own your account and tokens. Don’t forget to print your keys, it’s impossible to restore them.
You have 40 votes per day to like or dislike posts, don’t miss this chance, vote for articles you like to make Golos.io Top more interesting and get a reward.
Tags are the topics that helps you to search for interesting content. Each post should have at least one tag. You can subscribe for a tag as well as for an author.
Unlike other social platforms, we had several feeds. New - only the latest posts. Trending - posts which are talked about. Popular - posts with the biggest reward.
Tokens are a cryptocurrency of the Golos blockchain. All rewards for posts, comments or curation are paid in tokens. You can easily trade them on exchanges.
Everything written on Golos.io remains in blockchain.
